title: How to style components in React?
content: I'm having trouble styling my React components. Any advice?

answers.content: You can use styled-components library to style your React components. It provides a great way to write component-specific styles.
Another option is to use CSS modules. It allows you to write CSS that is scoped to a specific component.

title: What is the purpose of JSX?
content: I'm new to React and I'm confused about JSX. Can someone explain its purpose?

answers.content: JSX is a syntax extension for JavaScript that allows you to write HTML-like code in your JavaScript files. It's used in React to define the structure of your UI components.
JSX makes it easier to visualize and write UI components. It gets transpiled to JavaScript by tools like Babel.
